premiumGrade.title: Coffee Farm
premiumGrade.information: Our coffee is cultivated on dedicated farms located in optimal growing conditions to ensure purity, traceability, and consistent quality from the very beginning.

handPicked.title: Harvesting Coffee Cherries
handPicked.information: Coffee cherries are carefully handpicked at peak ripeness to protect their delicate structure and preserve their natural quality.
handPicked.name: Facility Center

organicCertified.title: Bean Separation
organicCertified.information: Skilled workers meticulously separate the coffee beans from each cherry, maintaining hygiene and precision at every step.

freshHarvest.title: Drying Process
freshHarvest.information: The freshly separated beans are gently dried under controlled conditions to enhance aroma, stabilize flavor, and preserve active compounds.

traditionalCultivation.title: Sorting & Grading
traditionalCultivation.information: Dried coffee beans are carefully sorted and graded according to international quality parameters, including flavor profile and purity.

qualityTested.title: Roasting
qualityTested.information: Beans are roasted in a controlled environment using precision techniques to unlock flavor, aroma, and optimal freshness.

sustainableSource.title: Packaging & Storage
sustainableSource.information: Roasted coffee is packaged and stored in designated facilities under monitored conditions to maintain quality until dispatch.

versatileUse.title: Dispatch & Shipping
versatileUse.information: Orders are prepared and shipped with care, ensuring secure handling, full traceability, and on-time delivery to our customers.

johnSmith.name: Mohammad Al-Hussein

sarahJohnson.name: Santa De Lores
sarahJohnson.testimonial: We witness the purity, quality and safety of coffee provided by Breva Coffee.

michaelChen.name: Rohan Kumar
michaelChen.testimonial: Breva Coffee provides coffee with great taste and aroma. It truly carries the meaning of Taste the Life.

whyUs.subtitle: Why Choose Us
whyUs.title: Where Authenticity Meets Excellence
whyUs.description: Breva Coffee delivers premium, export-quality coffee sourced directly from trusted farms, expertly roasted, and scientifically tested to meet international standards — ensuring exceptional purity, powerful aroma, rich flavor, and superior taste.

bestQuality.title: Uncompromising Quality
bestQuality.description: Harvested at peak ripeness and roasted with precision to preserve maximum aroma, flavor intensity, and natural purity.

premiumProduct.title: Export-Grade Premium Product
premiumProduct.description: Only carefully selected coffee beans that comply with international quality benchmarks are approved for packaging.

authenticSource.title: Verified Authentic Origin
authenticSource.description: Sourced from reputable farms located in ideal coffee-growing regions, ensuring genuine origin and consistent quality.

directFromFarm.title: Direct Farm-to-Market Supply
directFromFarm.description: A transparent supply chain without intermediaries, guaranteeing freshness, full traceability, and fair sourcing practices.
